summary: This document is an email chain from July 2019 among U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) staff and an FBI contact, discussing the preparation and sending of victim notification letters for the Epstein case. It involves verifying and updating a victim list in the Victim Notification System (VNS), noting missing contact information for some victims and an upcoming court conference.

persons.name: Victim-Witness Assistant
persons.context: A staff member at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York who is managing the victim list and notification process, attaching documents and asking for guidance on sending letters.

events.title: Email chain regarding victim notifications
events.description: Email correspondence among U.S. Attorney's Office staff and FBI regarding updating the victim list and preparing to send notification letters to victims in the Epstein case.

events.title: Follow-up on victim contact information
events.description: Internal emails discussing the need to obtain contact information for several victims on the list, with plans to coordinate with the FBI.

events.title: Initial victim list preparation and corrections
events.description: Emails regarding the creation of an updated victim list, requests for corrections, and additions of victims to the Victim Notification System (VNS).

locations.context: Address of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, mentioned as the office location of the Victim-Witness Assistant.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from July 2019 showing the U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) actively managing a victim notification list for the Epstein case.
It references an 'updated victim list' with some victims highlighted due to missing contact information and one who opted out of notifications.
The correspondence indicates coordination with the FBI to obtain victim contact information and update the Victim Notification System (VNS).
An upcoming court conference is mentioned as a reason to expedite the sending of victim notification letters.
